name: Midnight Odyssey
description:
Midnight Odyssey is a 2D platform puzzle game. Player need to control the shepherdess or the little prince to let them both escape from the house.

Here is the instruction of the game:

A - moving left

D - moving right

Q - control the little prince

E - control the shepherdess.

W - swith the light.

If you are interested in this game please follow my personal website:

https://www.yangying-ren-gameandart.com/
